item.title: [PI] Russian's Castle War help
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

Can someone help me add in russian’s castle wars? I got it from the source usapkz and i attempted to add it onto my source. However, usapkz is a dspk, and mine isn’t. I get errors for adding events, any help on this?
Event Example:

[code] if (c.inCwGame()) {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(c, new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer e) {
CastleWars.updateCwObects©;
e.stop();
}

			@Override
			public void stop() {
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				
			}
		}, 200);
	}[/code]

I will (of course) be giving credit to russian and usaclub
EDIT: would this work?

[code] if (c.inCwGame()) {
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer e) {
CastleWars.updateCwObects©;
e.stop();
}

			@Override
		}, 200);
	}[/code]

i changed my events to that kind of format and it doesn’t give me errors

Read full topic
